alert.note: Alert for Elko; Lander (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 01 at 7:46PM PDT until June 01 at 8:15PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: The National Weather Service in Elko Nevada has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lander County in north central Nevada... West central Elko County in northeastern Nevada... * Until 815 PM PDT. * At 746 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 18 miles south of Midas, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Lander and west central Elko Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
